title: Microsoft Cuts Earnings and Revenue Forecasts; Tech giant cut sales and earnings guidance for the current quarter, citing the impact of foreign-exchange rates
text:
Earnings are expected to be between $2.24 a share and $2.32 a share, down from prior guidance of $2.28 a share to $2.35 a share.

Shares fell 2.5% in premarket trading Thursday.

This article will be updated.

Write to Will Feuer at will.feuer@wsj.com
